description: Easy to Moderate hike from trailhead to Christie Falls. This route is circular in nature so you do not need to back track. The hike is 8 km and take approximately 2 hours at a pace of 4.2 km/h.
directions: Heading from Nanaimo on Hwy 1 south turn right at Oyster Sto'lo Road(Oyster Bay Indian Reserve) and follow road (600 meters) until it ends.
title: Christie Falls
